targets.rawSql: SELECT toStartOfMinute(time) as time, count() / 60 as requests_per_second FROM web_server_logs WHERE time >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SELECT toStartOfMinute(time) as time, countIf(response_code >= 500) / 60 as errors_per_second FROM web_server_logs WHERE time >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SELECT response_code, count(*) as count FROM web_server_logs WHERE time >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR GROUP BY response_code ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT toStartOfMinute(time) as time, quantile(0.50)(response_time) as p50, quantile(0.95)(response_time) as p95, quantile(0.99)(response_time) as p99 FROM web_server_logs WHERE time >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT
  event_time AS time,
  query,
  query_duration_ms / 1000 AS duration_seconds,
  user,
  current_database
FROM system.query_log
WHERE
  type = 'QueryFinish'
  AND event_time >= now() - INTERVAL 30 minute
ORDER BY event_time DESC

SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(event_time, INTERVAL 1 minute) AS time,
    count() AS queries_per_minute
FROM system.query_log
WHERE
    type = 'QueryFinish'
    AND event_time >= now() - INTERVAL 1 hour
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    sum(bytes_on_disk) / 1024 AS table_size_kb
FROM system.parts
WHERE
    active
    AND database = 'default'
    AND table = 'web_server_logs'

SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(ingestion_time, INTERVAL 1 minute) AS time_bucket,
    avg(toUnixTimestamp(ingestion_time) - toUnixTimestamp(time)) AS avg_latency_seconds,
    max(toUnixTimestamp(ingestion_time) - toUnixTimestamp(time)) AS max_latency_seconds,
    count() AS events
FROM web_server_logs
WHERE ingestion_time >= now() - INTERVAL 1 hour
GROUP BY time_bucket
ORDER BY time_bucket

SELECT count(*) 
FROM web_server_logs
WHERE time >= now() - INTERVAL 5 minute

title: Web Log Monitoring Pipeline - Architecture Comparison
